website_summaries.verdict: 4 blades and a powerful motor offer a close shave in a model that includes a pivoting head for maximum flexibility.
pros: We love the maneuverability of the pivoting head on this model
Users are able to reach those tough angles on the face without sacrificing any shaving power
The 14,000 cuts per minute motor equals the most powerful Panasonic motors
cons: While the pivoting head helps with chin and face angles, some users report it makes it more difficult to get a close shave on their neck area

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few others that didn't ever come near this one. I sometimes shave in while taking a shower. It's completely water proof. Nice, smooth close shave. I really like it and highly recommend it. Bought in Nov. 2016 August 2017 Update : as of June 2017 it's not holding charge. Usedan to save everyday for a week before requiring to recharge. As of June it began declining. It's now good for a shave and a half at best. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Citizen

customer_reviews.title: Weak and hazardous to the skin
customer_reviews.text: Do not trust the five star reviews. I doubt they are even real. If they are I'm baffled how those people think this is a good product. It took longer than a regular razor for a clean shave. Worse, it left cut wounds all over. Some hair follicles I couldn't shave with it, so I switched back to my razor to finish off. This is a TERRIBLE product, borderline false advertising. I initiated a return and will never buy from Panasonic ever again.
customer_reviews.author: doos

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shaver, super easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I have used other brands like Norelco-Philips and Braun for years. This is the best shaver I had. Shaves as close a a blade, and very easy to clean. To clean them all you have to do is add a few drops of liquid hand soap and run it ultrasound setting. It releases all the shavings and all you have to do is run under tab water and dry it. Could not be simpler and cheap to clean it. No need for cleaning apparatus or expensive cleaning solutions. Charge lasts over a week. Trimmer works great also. No need to spend more, this shaver is as good as you are going to get.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sezen

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: My old Panasonic ES 8103 3 blade shaver did a pretty reasonable job - not as good as a regular blade, but pretty decent. After 5 years, it still worked fine, but the seals failed, allowing water to enter when cleaning or shaving. After reading many reviews, I purchased this model for use while travelling. Sort of a let down. The battery doesn't last nearly as long as the 5 year old Panasonic, and the shave is only marginally more comfortable. Doesn't seem to shave either closer or faster than the old unit. I will probably keep it for trips, but it is never going to be good enough to function as my only shaving device.
customer_reviews.author: J. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: An Amazing Razor
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Do I love this shaver! I have had an older 2 blade Panasonic for like 10 years and when I finally decided to remove the winter beard this year I bought this new model. First I like the panasonics because they don't irritate my face but I was absolutely amazed at what a close comfortable shave I got with this razor. For a little over a hundred dollars it's an amazing value and I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: OldthorTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Slow...Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I've had this shaver now for several months. After reading reviews I had hoped this Panasonic shaver would be the equal of the other leading shaver brand but that the cutting blocks would last longer. This shaver cuts very slowly and unevenly. One must go over the same area repeatedly. I tried using a lubricating gel but this didn't help. Stay away from this shaver if you are in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: My Son was So Unhappy With This Razor That He Abandoned it After Two Use Attempts
customer_reviews.text: This razor apparently does not shave well and pulls and pinches more than it shaves. I would return it, but my son, for whom I bought this razor, has informed me of his dissatisfaction with it only now. Be aware and avoid this razor.
customer_reviews.author: R Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Good value electric razor.
customer_reviews.text: Very adequate wet or dry. Gives a clean shave easily IF you keep up with your beard. Struggles with more than two days growth. It is loud. It will wake others in the house. Forget the timer. Not precise and wipes out with any amount of growth. I do find it an OUTSTANDING value costing less than half of other quality razors Replacement blades, etc have not been a problem. Make sure to lock it when you travel.
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS D GRIFFITH

customer_reviews.title: Best shave from electric razor.
customer_reviews.text: Last 3 shavers were Norelco, noticed quality drop on my last one. When it died I read reviews and seems like quality dropped even more, so I went shopping. Settled on this Panasonic and am I ever glad I did. This is everything I need in a razor. Shave clean in half the time of the rotary heads, super easy cleaning. If they maintain this standard, ill never buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Marte Holley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, what I wanted and more
customer_reviews.text: I was using a product from another manufacturer which was essentially a beard trimmer, I kept using it because I have big hands and I liked the design. But it was not effective and leaving my face really sore. So I decided to get a real electric shaver. This product is fantastic. I bought it for two reasons. I really like Panasonic products and I liked the design. It is amazing. It really does a great job. Within a minute or two, my face is super smooth. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: ReaderNYC

customer_reviews.title: GOOD FOR ELECTRIC.
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a Braun and a Norelco. I first tried the Braun and it just got worse over a year and then I bought a Norelco and another waste of money. The Panasonic although not in the same league as a Gillette razor blade, is far superior than the Braun or the Norelco though pricier. Higher rpm motor. A little pricier and very fast re-charge.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Best I have used yet
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about a year now and it's great. I have been using the norelco 3 round head for years. I bought a new one of those and this at the same time and this one wins hands down! Barrel life is great. I always loose count of uses befor it finally needs a recharge. I have not used it wet yet but dry is so fast and smooth. The trimmer does not work as good but everything else wins hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Ty B

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this razor. This is the first time I used an electric shaver. I was always getting irritated around the bikini line with a regular razor so I decided to try this. So far so good. I've been shaving every day and no irritation yet. The dry shave does not give you the smoothest skin but it's not bad. Using it in the shower with Kiss my Face shaving gel was much better though. I got a very close shave, almost as close as with a safety razor.
customer_reviews.author: Ally S.

customer_reviews.title: By far the best electric razor I've owned
customer_reviews.text: By far the best electric razor I've owned. As close or closer than a razor blade shave, not kidding. I can't see spending the extra on a Braun or other super high end razor when this shaves as well as it does. No razor burn, easy to clean. Charge hasn't gone below 80% and I haven't had it plugged in in 2 weeks. If you are in the market for a high end electric, give this a try. Then send me a tip for all the money you saved.
customer_reviews.author: Rob C.

customer_reviews.title: Super Shaver
customer_reviews.text: Excellent electric shaver... gives closest and fastest shave I've seen from an electric. Got this to replace the Panasonic ES8243 which I loved and served me well. This shaver is very similar in size and form factor to the ES8243 which is a good thing to me. It does a better job than the 8243 , has a faster motor, shaves quicker and seems to have a better battery. I like the shave head better than the Arc5 models which are too bulky and less maneuverable. Great feature is super easy cleanup, just hold shaver under running water.
customer_reviews.author: dogbone

customer_reviews.title: Got a refund
customer_reviews.text: If you have coarse facial hair this shaver is worthless. I put the shaver to my face and it literally cut nothing. It pulled the hair but couldn't cut it. Maybe foil shavers aren't for everybody. This one was worthless to me and I sent it back the next day. Also it feels and looks cheap. It's loud.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Pickett

customer_reviews.title: Dubious upgrade!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3 panasonic wet dry razor I have owned. I do occasionally us a harry's blade, for daily use this is my preference. This is a bit of a rip off. While it is advertised as a 4 head it really is only two internal blades. What is nice is the the motor seems stronger than the earlier older ones and maybe the battery life is longer. Otherwise the cheaper one are virtually identical.
customer_reviews.author: George The czar of rhythm

customer_reviews.title: Nice and good price.
customer_reviews.text: I like it, it doesn't get too hot too quickly and it does a pretty good job. You can use wet or dry I personally used dry if I'm in a hurry but If I got the time I used with soap on my face or even shaving cream, although you have to clean it again after using with shaving cream because otherwise the cream will get stuck in between places. but really good.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Razor
customer_reviews.text: I really like this razor. It makes my face clean without pushing hard - does a much better job than my previous rotating razor. As mentioned by many reviews, it’s very easy to clean this razor. Put a little face soap on the foil and run the razor for seconds, then wash it under running water. I hope they could provide more color choices.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Way Too Noisy
customer_reviews.text: It works great but after about 7 - 8 months becomes terribly noisy. I've owned two of these and both did that, that is why I replaced the first one after a year. It lasted 2 1/2 years and the battery is almost dead. Before I started with Panasonic shavers in 2012 my shavers lasted a decade.
customer_reviews.author: James Preston

customer_reviews.title: I will never go back to Rotary shavers
customer_reviews.text: For 20 years, I used different medium/high quality Norelco rotary shavers. This is the first foil shaver I've used and a big upgrade over the rotaries. I've been using it 2 weeks and the battery is over half full. Proprietary charger cable but every company does that. It's a close, fast shave with zero skin irritation. The cut hair bucket is 5x the size, seldom needing emptying. No downsides to this Panasonic and I will never go back to rotary.
customer_reviews.author: Walt Brubaker

customer_reviews.title: Confusing Cleaning Instructions
customer_reviews.text: I just got this and plan to write a more detailed review when I've used it more, but I immediately have to knock it down to 4 stars because it came with two completely different sets of cleaning instructions. The instruction manual tells you to do something completely different than what the fancy insert with pictures tells you to do, which resulted in me doing some random mixture of the two which may or may not have cleaned it safely. This really isn't a dealbreaker since cleaning a razor is truly not that difficult, but it makes one wonder what's going on at Panasonic that they would ship something without checking it first.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: It's Ok but my old Philips Norelco rotary shaver was better.
customer_reviews.text: I got this because it had good reviews on Amazon. My old Norelco shaver was better but the new replacement blades are bad quality. After buying two sets of bad Norelco blades I gave up. The Panasonic is OK but I have to shave longer and still not as good a shave as the Norelco.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Stone

customer_reviews.title: Safety issue with mine!
customer_reviews.text: 2 inch pin came out of mine where the blades are located. I saw it protruding and pull in out, it would have really made a gash if I had not seen it. Do not know how it fits back into the blades or I would put it back. If anyone from Panasonic would like to advise, I would appreciate a reply or I can send back. Anyway, probably rare occurrence but I certainly will not order it again.{ It came out of blade area.}
customer_reviews.author: Norman R. Scarberry

customer_reviews.title: Worth A Try
customer_reviews.text: This is a comfortable way to shave if using an electric shaver. It does not pull at your hair and cuts reasonably close for an electric. There is no electric shaver on this planet or any adjoining planet that can shave as close as a Gillette Atra or some similar type of razor. But there are times when a close shave is not a necessity and in those instances this Panasonic will do an adequate job. It is comfortable to hold and is fairly quiet. It charges up quickly and holds its charge for plenty of time to do a complete shave. I have had numerous electric shavers and this is among the top of the line.
customer_reviews.author: Duffer.Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Always Panasonic electric shaver
customer_reviews.text: I've tried Braun and Norelco shavers for the past 20+ years. I tried a Panasonic shaver for the first time several years ago and fell in love with it. This is my second Panasonic after I gave the first one (3-blade shaver) to my dad who was struggling with a Norelco shaver in getting a close shave. I use it in the shower daily.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: While they work, they work well.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought three of these Panasonic shavers. None of them worked for more than a year. The last one died this morning, without warning. As usual, the electronics failed. Although the shaver was fully charged, it did nothing when the on/off button was pressed. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Philomath

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Razor, ES-LF51-A, Men’s Electric 4-Blade Cordless Shaver
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive. Don't cut closely for a bald head. So I shave it now but then use a manual razor after that daily. I should have gotten Braun. Panasonic makes fabulous cameras and videos but their small motorized accessories suck.
customer_reviews.author: MarcoMarks

customer_reviews.title: Use it for at least a month before anything.
customer_reviews.text: I have had two Panasonic shavers before this one. This one is by far much better than the other two. It provides 14,000 rpm and you barely feel any discomfort when cutting event the thickest hair. If you are new to using this type of shavers, you need to get your hair used to the shaver. use it for at least a month before you decide it is not for you. The direction of the hair will change the more you use it and you'll get to the point where shaving will be a delight. 5 stars for this product. If something else happen along the road, I'll update the review later on.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend buying the Panasonic over the braun price wise hands ...
customer_reviews.text: for the price it's very competitive to the 300 dollar braun shavers. Ive had the highest end braun shaver and they both have ups and downs. Between the two it's a toss up. A lot of it has to do with the user. I would recommend buying the Panasonic over the braun price wise hands down. Drop test...I broke my old 300 dollar braun from dropping it from about 4.5 feet on accident of course. The thing is totalled. I dropped the Panasonic from the same height and it's still fine. It chipped it a tiny bit but nothing major. But its not bomb proof. Blades haven't dulled yet. Had for like 8 months.
customer_reviews.author: PonySlaystation

customer_reviews.title: not a bad product
customer_reviews.text: if you skin isn't as sensitive and just need a quick easy shave this works. you do have to go over the same spot a few times however which can cause irritation. Can probably buy better. I have had this for years and it still works. however I did switch to wet shaving with a double edge blade a few months back. won't return to using this ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Nice shaves!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how well this shaver works for me. I have a medium beard with lots of places on my chin where hairs like to hide. This shaver cuts most of the beard quickly and is able to get the difficult hairs with less effort than my previous shaver. Shaves now take half the time that they took before. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: W. Goetzinger

customer_reviews.title: He does not like it, I also got him the preshave and ...
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this electric for my boyfriend. He does not like it, I also got him the preshave and aftershave to use with it. It works well at first and then slows down and pinches him. He went back to Gillette razors. Since I threw away the box, I put it in his travel kit for when we travel. Once in awhile it is okay to use it. Sincerely, Ginger
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shave, but only works 50% of the time
customer_reviews.text: When this razor works, it works beautifully. Running it wet with a little shave gel leaves the cleanest shave I've been able to achieve without a safety razor. With that said, I have only had this razor a month (JUST missed the return window) and it has started malfunctioning. Essentially it seems the gears are not connecting somewhere inside the razor. I turn it on and the razor starts, but the blades don't engage. I've found a way to work around it (wiggling the shave heads with the screen off) but that's not really acceptable. Panasonic, if you have QA that read this: I'd like to make an exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor A

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: When new, I was able to get five uses from a full charge. Now it's down to 2-3 uses. Shaves were comfortable, but not particularly close. Fairly quiet with minimal vibration.
customer_reviews.author: Frank D

customer_reviews.title: Use this everyday
customer_reviews.text: Have been nothing but pleased with this shaver. It's perfectly executed. I have had several different shavers over the years. This one give a quick and close shave and holds a charge for a long time and is water resistant. There is nothing more to ask.
customer_reviews.author: H. Giles

customer_reviews.title: Shaves Closer Than A Blade
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a number of electric razors and have never been happy with how they work and end up going back to a blade for a closer shave. This razor was a gift and I was ready to be disappointed yet again but to my surprise it shaved better than any blade or electric razor I have ever used. A great clean close shave that will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: The Mad Tatter

customer_reviews.title: Nice Razor
customer_reviews.text: Great Razor, I have used Panasonic Razors for over 15yrs. Have had 2-3 prior models. All have lasted a long time. This one is my favorite of them all. Charges Fast, Holds charge for several days. My teen daughter kept stealing this razor from me (even though she has 2 female razors of her own) I bought her one for her own use and she likes it better than any of the "girl" razors that she's had. Now she can stop taking mine! (gross).
customer_reviews.author: Gordo

customer_reviews.title: Really like this razor
customer_reviews.text: Really like this razor. Have had it for over a month and it provides a great shave. Much closer than my old Braun. Wish I had bought it several years ago.
customer_reviews.author: D Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Razor!
customer_reviews.text: Got this on a deal during Black Friday. Very happy with the product and shaving results. It has a powerful motor and 4 blades, which is all you need really. For the price this one is a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: RYAN

customer_reviews.title: Quality shaver
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 94 year old neighbor. As most elderly people he doesn't like change or anything different. But he really likes this shaver. It is much quieter than his older shavers. It gives him a wonderfully close shave, and he's extremely particular being a retired watch repairman. It doesn't come with a cleaning brush. I explained to him that it's to be cleaned by water. But we kept cleaning brushes from old shavers which help with cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Ernmeister

customer_reviews.title: Never thought I would enjoy shaving! Say hello to your new favorite toy.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a dream come true. It has a card in the box telling you to give it time while your skin gets used to it, but I loved it from day one. It works well wet or dry, very easy to clean, incredibly gentle, and surprisingly close shave. It works best for shorter stubbles, but you can probably go 5-7 days between shaves and it will still work well, and won't irritate your skin if you have to go over some areas a few times. Say goodbye to razor burns, rash, cuts, and wasteful razors.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: After almost 1 year, I highly recommend this shaver!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good razor! I had a Braun shaver for years but I really like this shaver! I charge the battery about once every 2 weeks. It’s light, it’s easy to clean, but most importantly, it flat out does a nice job! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Great product; recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shaver. There are quite a few long, very detailed, reviews. Yes it’s a little noisy. If your wife is sleeping and your bath is attached to your bedroom she might not want you shaving just then. But the thing is running at 14,000 whatever so I’ll take the fast, close shave over whisper mode. Quick charge, great shave; recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Greg B.

customer_reviews.title: The nose knows
customer_reviews.text: Returned. This was my first Panasonic in years. It could not reach the whiskers under my nostrils. The trimmer did not get them, either. I gave it a great effort, but when it irritated my nostrils, I sent it back. Your mileage might vary.
customer_reviews.author: r_a_b

customer_reviews.title: Excellent razor
customer_reviews.text: I have to use an electric razor because my skin is so sensitive. They have their draw backs when compared to a manual razor, but this Panasonic is as close as you'll get to a razor shave. It takes half the time to shave when compared to my 2 year old Panasonic, even when it was brand new.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shaver, owned the older 8228 and at first ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shaver, owned the older 8228 and at first I was not sure if this one was going to live up to the older Panasonic wet dry reputation. I can definitely say it gives me a really close shave for an Electric. The faster motor really does work better.
customer_reviews.author: dpro

customer_reviews.title: Braun alternative
customer_reviews.text: My first brand after Braun in more than 40 years. Panasonic made good portable stereo units back in the 60s why not a good shaver today? I’m happy with it . Shaves close. Previous ripoff replacement head manufacturers will never get another dime from me
customer_reviews.author: Not Biden

customer_reviews.title: My face personally got a little worse compared to the Shick Hydro but it was an ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I have a soft little baby face and hoped that this would take care of the rashes I get every day from shaving with a Shick Hydro 5. My face personally got a little worse compared to the Shick Hydro but it was an overall nice shaver. Did well dry and wet and felt very good shaving with it. I would recommend this to people that are looking to use something electric but don't have a little baby face like me.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kilroy

customer_reviews.title: Best shavers
customer_reviews.text: I've always buy Panasonic shavers this is my 5th one since 1990 they last along time
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Clean shave but too noisy
customer_reviews.text: — Good Have. Takes around 30 days for the shaver to adjust . As per product and it does take that long — clean shave wet or dry Dislikes - Noisy as hell . Wakes up everyone like a lawn mower started ! Splatters water when on and held under water.
customer_reviews.author: bay

customer_reviews.title: Delivery fine. One concern with product.
customer_reviews.text: Panasonic Arc4 & wet shave technique replaced 3-head rotary, and shave is significantly better with Arc4. Best shave I'm getting in over 40 years of shaving. One concern is that after about 2 months of use, the battery is running low much quicker than when it was brand new & I don't like that trend - how will it be in a year or more? You plug the razor in to recharge the battery, but you cannot shave with it plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Urquhart

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING piece of shaver.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. If you are thinking of buying this shaver, look no further. The charge lasts at least 6 days, probably more. The machine feels nice in your hand, and the buttons are great. I love that its immersible. I love how easy to clean. Two things I don't love - I don't love that you can't use it while it charges. I also don't love that it’s a little loud. But I get over those pretty quick because when I am through shaving I look like a million bucks.
customer_reviews.author: toddlersdad

customer_reviews.title: It can even be used in the shower
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for shaving and trimming beard plus easy to take along on trips
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: By far the best shaver I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done. It's a bit loud but no big deal. Battery lasts me easily a week and a half. I get the best shave with a SMALL amount of shaving cream immediately after shower. Don't overdo the shaving cream. Wastes it, and doesn't help the shaver, if you goop it on. Shaving is quicker than most other razors but not quite as quick as it was with my old Norelco that I had 15 years ago. But this Panasonic gives me a much cleaner shave.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Should have tried long time ago
customer_reviews.text: Been shaving with Mach 3 razors for years. I had to shave in the shower after opening my pores with hot water. My skin in sensitive and my beard is tough. This Panasonic says to give it a while for your beard to adjust to using and electric razor. I didn't have to. This thing mowed through my beard from day one. Very quick, and comfortable shave. Maybe not as butter smooth as shaving against the grain with new blades on a regular razor, but definitely close enough with a lot less pain and bleeding. I have only used it dry. No need for the steam treatment to soften beard. I really like this razor!
customer_reviews.author: chuck

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: ive owned norelcos mostly and this thing is friggen awesome...dont hesitate to buy this if ur in the market for a new shaver..u wont be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: python

customer_reviews.title: Love. This.
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying that I am reviewing this against the terrible $50 women's electric razors I have bought in the past. I should also clarify that I don't have a beard and use this mainly on my legs, underarms, etc. That being said, this thing is amazing. It's not quite as close of a shave as using a razor in the shower, but definitely close. So far I've only used it dry, but the results are fantastic. Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Prime addict

customer_reviews.title: Neck irriatation central, but a close shave otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: If you have sensitive skin, beware. This thing chewed my neck up. I tried revamping my technique several times but it just wouldn't stop ruining my mornings. I wanted to like it. I gave it a little less than a month and called it. Great, close shave on the rest of my face though, so if you don't react harshly to it, it'll probably be great for you. The other main petpeave I had was the positioning of the trimmer, which made it impossible to see the area you were using it on. Pretty glaring design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: NickP

customer_reviews.title: best electric shaver I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: 54 years old, medium to thick beard, best electric shaver I have ever owned. Does not require a ton of pressure to get a close shave, even in all the trouble spots on your face and neck. Charge lasts for a week easy. Pivoting head makes it easy to hit all spots. I am often called an opinionated, curmudgeon and yet I am saying nothing but positives on this item. Feature to lock razor power in OFF position for travel is quite nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic ES-LF51-A Men's 4-Blade shaving system
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shaver because of product loyalty. I've had a similar model for the past 3 years and it has held up extremely well. I felt it was time to upgrade so I bought this one to replace it. This model is equally if not more impressive. I get a terrific shave each and every time. It is definitely one of the best shavers on the market and the quality that you are getting for the price is unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: Big Hen

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I used to use an electric shaver but finally quit after too many ingrown whiskers. Now after years of shaving with a blade I had enough of the cuts & gouges on my face. I've had this for about two weeks & so far am very pleased. I've only had to charge it once & no ingrown whiskers. Reviews say it takes a month or so for your face to get used to a shaver. Hopefully that's the case because so far I haven't been able to get that close a shave on my neck. Satisfied so far though.
customer_reviews.author: SAHD

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Norelco for 35 years, because I couldn't find a foil shaver that would work for me. Read the reviews on this one, and decided to give it a try. Wow! Much closer, smoother shave than the Norelco. Even better wet with gel, but don't usually bother with that. Only drawback is the cost of replacement blades and foil, much more than Norelco. Still, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Leszek M. Pawlowicz

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic makes a great razor
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd panasonic and I fully believe this one will give me several years of good clean shaving, as did my others.
customer_reviews.author: Guy B.

customer_reviews.title: I like this Panasonic razor
customer_reviews.text: I like this Panasonic razor, nothing less than a $300 lux razor. I bought one of them 5 years ago and after 5 years it broke and I bought another one
customer_reviews.author: Elmira

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I’ve only had it for less than a week but it shaves better than any other electric I’ve used .
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Gillete all my life, instant Panasonic convert
customer_reviews.text: A Short Story: Been using Gillete Mach 3s and 4s since I first started shaving during my teenage years. Enter 20s: Tired of expensive refill cartridges and time-consuming shaves that feel like using a machete in the jungle when I let my stubble grow out for more than a week or two. Do my research and see Amazon's most recommended razor is this one. Order it with middling expectations. Arrives on my doorstep. Try it. Shocked. Smooth shave. No resistance. Simple to use. No refill cartridges. Many shaves per charge. Easy on the skin. New convert! Post 5* Amazon review. Hope others can discover the joy of this razor.
customer_reviews.author: Avi

customer_reviews.title: hesitant to spend this much, but glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical that a shaving experience could be worth the money for this razor, but making this purchase has shifted my perspective. This device provides a powerful, comfortable shave beyond what I've experienced before. I usually go for razors in the $70 to $90 range and have been happy with them. I'm more than happy with this item for the few months I've had it, I'm on the verge of ecstatic.
customer_reviews.author: Heath Howe

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this
customer_reviews.text: This was advertised to work in the shower. It doesn't. The only way this works is if my face is totally dry and even then it takes numerous repeated passes to get a proper shave.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: A great shaver at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I'm coming from a Panasonic ES-8807 and that I've had for 8 years. I really liked that shaver but the ES-LF51-A is a much better shaver. Shaves closer easier with less pressure and quicker. Just a all around more comfortable and better shave. The positive reviews are correct. This is a great razor. Don't let the very few negative reviews keep you from buying this it's one of the best rated shavers on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sanford12

customer_reviews.title: Beats a Braun
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a Braun Series 7 when I found on Amazon from other owner's review comments, the Braun had a new owner (Proctor and Gamble) and poor quality blades when I needed new ones. My experience with the Panasonic is good and it shave me better than the Braun. Note the Braun was purchased at COSTCO and they refunded the full price a year after I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Last  may be first

customer_reviews.title: Great Shaver
customer_reviews.text: Charges fast and shaves close. I've had 2 other Panasonics that were wet/dry. This one beats both of them. They weren't 4 head ones. Got it before estimated delivery date and was fully satisfied with Amazons service and receiving of item. Was fast and correct.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur C. Everett

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver
customer_reviews.text: Had an Arc 4 prior but the charger was lost and couldn't charge it anymore. Pretty upset about it. So here I was waiting for the newer Arc 4 to drop in price. Better than previous model but pretty much the same thing. No complaints, love the Arc series.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: I love how quickly it shaves and how efficient it is
customer_reviews.text: I've used rotary type Norelco shavers for about 20 years now and finally bought a foil type shaver. I will never buy another rotary shaver after using this one. I love how quickly it shaves and how efficient it is. I have a thick tough stubble and it grows fast. My last shaver only lasted me two years and it was the Sensotouch 3d Norelco. Before I bought that shaver I was really looking at the foil type shaver and decided to stay with what I knew. I love my new Panasonic shaver. The only complaint, it is LOUD.
customer_reviews.author: Destin

customer_reviews.title: Clean Shave
customer_reviews.text: I have always used manual razors and I bought this due to a skin condition I got, I got hoping it wouldn't irritate my skin anymore and it works awesome! It gives me a very close and clean shave! Clean up is easy and love that it's waterproof!
customer_reviews.author: Saul Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Electric Shaver is a good choice for me!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and worth the money. Shaves close, not as close as I can get with a razor blade but still very good. None of my electric shavers get that close and I have owned several different major brands. It holds a charge that allows several shaves before recharging. I have no regrets buying this shaver and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: RadioFlyer

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't trade it for anything.
customer_reviews.text: So far this is a superb product. I wouldn't trade it for anything.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t ask for more
customer_reviews.text: Best electric shaver ever. Also a very nice case for safekeeping
customer_reviews.author: Jana Mento

customer_reviews.title: Great razor.
customer_reviews.text: My husband really likes this razor. His aging face, with its creases and bumps, is quite happy with this razor.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy G.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves it! He uses it all the time! Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Like the swiveling head
customer_reviews.text: Charges fast, clean cut, quiet, light. Like the swiveling head. Like the screen showing how much charge is left.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this as a gift. Battery stopped holding a charge after ~5 months which was also past the product warranty date. I had purchased and still own another Panasonic razor but unless this issue is fixed I'll be purchasing another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very crappy for me
customer_reviews.text: Very crappy for me. It doesn’t shave done as far as I need it to, and it makes my face break out. It’s just an expensive paper weight
customer_reviews.author: dumponyoo

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: This razor shaves faster than my old Panasonic razor. It gives a smooth shave & the battery lasts longer & recharges in a shorter period of time. Another quality Panasonic product.
customer_reviews.author: Big Tuna

customer_reviews.title: best shave for the money
customer_reviews.text: much better than the three blade, smother shave but it takes awhile doesn't razor burn like three blade would
customer_reviews.author: Ronald  W Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Close shave
customer_reviews.text: Used it first time today very happy with results felt like it was ad close a shave as blade
customer_reviews.author: Richard Zastrow

customer_reviews.title: He's a happy man
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this shaver. He had always used a manual shaver and finds this so much more comfortable and he isn't cutting himself all the time. He did find it took a few shaves to see how best to shave his neck and under his chin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: The only electric razor that has ever pleased my husband! This makes me Happy too!
customer_reviews.author: ronnileee

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job, I just don't like how the shaved ...
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job, I just don't like how the shaved hair falls out of the unit. Gets all over my back etc. Other than that, it's a good shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Bernier

customer_reviews.title: Could be better for the price
customer_reviews.text: It gives me a very close shave on most of my face but it has some difficulty on my neck. I've been forced to keep using a regular razor on my neck and I just use this for the rest of my face.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My old Panasonic after 5 years just seemed to not cut as fast so I splurged on the one and holy cow was this a good choice!
customer_reviews.author: Sp0rt4320

customer_reviews.title: ... an older Panasonic (about ten years old) that I loved. This unit with a linear motor works better ...
customer_reviews.text: Replacing an older Panasonic (about ten years old) that I loved. This unit with a linear motor works better than the razor it replace and I have great hopes that it will display the same reliability over time.
customer_reviews.author: Norman S.

customer_reviews.title: Bueno
customer_reviews.text: I'm sold on Panasonic razors now. Strong motor, good shave. Had a Braun (made in China) lasted a total of 2 weeks, used in shower 3 times before it died. This thing, daily use, in and out of shower, no issues. So far so good after a few months now.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Peru

customer_reviews.title: Really Impressed
customer_reviews.text: WOW!! For years I have always preferred the rotary style razors over the foil, but this has really changed my mind. It provides an incredibly comfortable shave and the closest to a standard razor that I have found. Cleaning is extremely easy, it literally takes 10-15 seconds and keeps it shaving like new. For those who have tried electric razor after electric razor to find one that you really like I would suggest giving this a try, I'm confident you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shaver
customer_reviews.text: My Husband loves this shaver, best one he ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: I really like this shaver
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shaver. It get pretty close but not as close as a good shave with a razor. It does very good on a single charge and is easy to clean. For the price I got it for it was a very good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: battery life is good. For the price I wish I didn't have ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, battery life is good. For the price I wish I didn't have to go over the same spot on my neck so many times. Works well if you shave every single day. Not as well if you let your hair grow for three days or more.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Bereznak

customer_reviews.title: BEST RAZOR OUT THERE
customer_reviews.text: BEST RAZOR OUT THERE. KEEPS A GREAT CHARGE AND SHAVES BETTER THEN A BLADE!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: NATIVE

customer_reviews.title: better than my last rotary shaver
customer_reviews.text: Close shave, better than my last rotary shaver. The replacement blades are expensive compared to the price I paid for the whole shaver.
customer_reviews.author: H. Adkinson

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good.
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty surprised. I've tried other electric razors and have been severely disappointed. However, this razor is great. If it pops up as a Lightning Deal, grab it.
customer_reviews.author: Changry

product_meta.title: Panasonic Razor, ES-LF51-A, Men’s Electric 4-Blade Cordless Shaver, Wet/Dry with Flexible Pivoting Head
product_meta.description: The Panasonic Arc 4ES-LF51-A men's electric razor delivers a close, clean, quick shave with four ultra-sharp stainless-steel Nanotech blades. Each Arc 4 blade is precision honed to a 30° edge, and an ultra-thin Arc4 foil gently and closely conforms to the individual contours of the face, neck and chin. This men's shaving machine includes a flexible pivoting shaver head to effortlessly guide blades and foil along the skin for outstanding electric razor comfort. Its Panasonic high-efficiency 14,000 cpm linear drive motor maintains peak mens electric razor power until the end of each battery charge for consistent, even Arc4 shaving. This exceptional electric razor for men includes a pop-up trimmer to add the perfect finish and detail to beards, mustaches and sideburns. The Panasonic Arc 4 is 100% waterproof, too, and can be easily used with foam or gel in the shower or used anytime for a smooth dry shave. A 5-stage LED in the sure-grip ES-LF51-A handle shows battery and charging status. Cleaning your Arc 4 is quick and simple. Just rinse the electric razor under running water to remove stubborn gel and stubble, leaving the Arc4 blades and foil fresh and renewed. And for electric razor shaving and grooming away from home, the Panasonic electric shaver comes with universal voltage, AC adaptor/charger and a durable travel pouch. The outer foil is very thin and can be damaged if not used correctly. Check that the foil is not damaged before using the shaver. Do not use the shaver if the foil is damaged as you will cut your skin.
feature_bullets: Panasonic Arc 4 men's electric razor features four ultra-sharp Nanotech blades for quick, clean and comfortable shaving
Ultra-thin, stainless-steel Multi-fit Arc4 foil conforms gently and closely to facial contours for outstanding shaving comfort
Flexible pivoting Panasonic electric shaver head glides effortlessly over face, chin, neck and jaw. Compatible accessories: WES9025PC, WES9167PC, WES9068PC

This Panasonic razor uses a fast, powerful Hyper Performance Arc4 Motor delivers 14,000 cuts per minute - that's 56,000 cross-cutting shaver actions per minute across 4 blades - and maintains continuous Arc 4 power for consistently even electric shaving..Wet dry electric razor convenience makes it easy to comfortably shave dry or over the sink or in the shower with foam or gel, 5-stage LED in the handle shows Panasonic shaver status, pop-up trimmer details mustaches and sideburns
Power Source: AC 100-240V (Automatic International Dual Voltage Conversion).Sonic Vibration Cleaning Mode
charging time1 hour and power source is AC 100-240V (Automatic International Dual Voltage Conversion)
